article_title: Teck Plans Temporary Shutdown at 6 Canadian Coal Operations
article_text:
Teck Resources Ltd. will temporarily idle activities at its six Canadian coal operations in the third quarter due to weak pricing and demand for steelmaking coal.

Vancouver-based Teck, a diversified miner, said the move will reduce planned third-quarter output by 22%, or about 1.5 million metric tons. Sales for the period are expected to total 6 million to 6.5 million tons. The shutdowns will be staggered and result in each operation...
